configs.match:
(?x)
  ^\s* # Leading whitespace
  (configfile|include|localrules|onerror|onstart|onsuccess|ruleorder|snakefile|workdir|pepfile|pepschema) # Keywords
  : # Ending in colon

rules.match:
(?x)
  ^\s* # Leading whitespace
  (checkpoint|rule|subworkflow) # Keywords
  (?:\s+(\w+))? # Optional rule name
  : # Ending in colon

ruleparams.match:
(?x)
  ^\s* # Leading whitespace
  (benchmark|conda|cwl|group|input|log|message|output|params|priority|resources|run|script|shadow|shell|singularity|threads|version|wildcard_constraints|wrapper|container) # Keywords
  : # Ending in colon
